issue.title: [IR] Add check in CI for substrait codegen dev workflow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14573](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14573). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Generated code should be check for staleness in CI

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14573?focusedCommentId=17607886) by @toddfarmer:*
The Compute IR component has been abandoned in favor of Substrait. Please see [here](https://lists.apache.org/thread/o9vf5fzkkpjzxqsw2bd5b6grh9ov8ys2) for details on engaging with the Substrait project.
